# Amplify Social Media Presence with O3 and GPT-4 Multi-Agent Team

### üåç **Overview**

This n8n workflow acts like a **virtual social media department**. A **Social Media Director Agent** coordinates multiple specialized AI agents (Instagram, Twitter/X, Facebook, TikTok, YouTube, and Analytics). Each agent creates or analyzes content for its platform, powered by **OpenAI models**.

The result? A **fully automated, cross-platform social media strategy**‚Äîfrom content creation to performance tracking.

---

## üü¢ Section 1: Trigger & Director Setup

üîó **Nodes:**

* **When chat message received (Trigger)** ‚Üí Starts the workflow whenever you send a request (e.g., ‚ÄúPlan a TikTok campaign for my product launch‚Äù).
* **Social Media Director Agent** (connected to **OpenAI O3 model**) ‚Üí Acts as the strategist.
* **Think Tool** ‚Üí Helps the Director ‚Äúreason‚Äù before delegating.

üí° **Beginner takeaway:**
This section makes your workflow interactive. You send a request ‚Üí the Director decides the best approach ‚Üí then it assigns tasks.

üìà **Advantage:**
Instead of manually planning content per platform, you only send **one command**, and the AI Director handles the strategy.

---

## üü¶ Section 2: Specialized Social Media Agents

üîó **Nodes (each paired with GPT-4.1-mini):**

* üì∏ **Instagram Content Creator** ‚Üí Visual storytelling, Reels, Hashtags
* üê¶ **Twitter/X Strategist** ‚Üí Viral tweets, trends, engagement
* üë• **Facebook Community Manager** ‚Üí Audience growth, ads, group engagement
* üéµ **TikTok Video Creator** ‚Üí Short-form video, viral trends
* üé¨ **YouTube Content Planner** ‚Üí Long-form strategy, SEO, thumbnails
* üìä **Analytics Specialist** ‚Üí Performance insights, cross-platform reporting

üí° **Beginner takeaway:**
Each platform has its **own AI expert**. They receive the Director‚Äôs strategy and produce tailored content for their platform.

üìà **Advantage:**
Instead of one-size-fits-all posts, you get **optimized content per platform**‚Äîincreasing reach and engagement.

---

## üü£ Section 3: Models & Connections

üîó **Nodes:**

* **OpenAI Chat Models** (O3 + multiple GPT-4.1-mini models)
* Each model is connected to its respective agent.

üí° **Beginner takeaway:**
Think of these as the ‚Äúbrains‚Äù behind each specialist. The Director uses **O3** for advanced reasoning, while the specialists use **GPT-4.1-mini** (cheaper, faster) for content generation.

üìà **Advantage:**
This keeps **costs low** while maintaining **quality output**.

---

## üìä Final Overview Table

| Section               | Nodes                                                    | Purpose                                | Benefit                        |
| --------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------- | ------------------------------ |
| üü¢ Trigger & Director | Chat Trigger, Director, Think Tool                       | Capture requests & plan strategy       | One command ‚Üí full social plan |
| üü¶ Specialists        | Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, TikTok, YouTube, Analytics | Platform-specific content              | Optimized posts per platform   |
| üü£ Models             | O3 + GPT-4.1-mini                                        | Provide reasoning & content generation | High-quality, cost-efficient   |

---

## üöÄ Why This Workflow is Powerful

* **Multi-platform coverage**: All major platforms handled in one flow
* **Human-like strategy**: Director agent makes real marketing decisions
* **Scalable & fast**: Generate a full campaign in minutes
* **Cost-effective**: O3 only for strategy, GPT-4.1-mini for bulk content
* **Beginner-friendly**: Just type your request ‚Üí get full campaign output

---
